question: Analyze the current technology adoption trends among leading companies in the financial services industry.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify companies operating in the financial services industry based on their industry type and active status.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":2,"task":"Gather details of technology stacks currently being used by the identified companies to understand their adopted technologies and platforms.","table":["CompanyTechStack"]},{"step":3,"task":"Analyze partnerships and vendor relationships of these companies to see which technology vendors are being utilized within the financial services sector.","table":["CompanyITPartnerDetail","CompanyVendorTechDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Examine any hiring trends within these companies to identify emerging technologies or skill sets that are currently in demand.","table":["CompanyHiringDetail"]},{"step":5,"task":"Compile social media engagement metrics for the companies in the financial services industry to measure their communication and reach regarding technology initiatives.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]}]
